scenario_text.value:
Oh Takuma, good timing. We’re short on hands,
help us out.
There’s so many injured here...

Yeah, it looks like the monsters here worked
hard to protect this place to the end.
If only we had come sooner...
Shuuji...
What could the enemy be after, you think?

They invaded despite the lack of humans here—
attacked any who resisted...

Isn’t it strange, considering how they’ve
moved up until now?

(Yeah, it is strange, isn’t it? We have no
clue what the enemy’s goal is...)

(Along with humans, maybe they’ve added the
monsters to the list of attack targets?)

(But regardless, shouldn’t we be focusing on
our rescue efforts?)
(What should I say to Shuuji?)
This is pretty weird.
They’re after the monsters.
Rescue takes priority.
This is pretty weird.

This is all pretty weird. They never acted
like this before...

Does the Master have some sort of goal? And
is something related to that goal up ahead?

What could it be, I wonder? Shoot, we lack
the data to hypothesize anything...

Um, Shuuji, my man... Should we prioritize
the rescue attempt for now?

Ah, yes, you’re right! Sorry, let’s focus our
efforts on that goal.

(Huh. The professor’s starting to rub off on
Shuuji, from the looks of it.)
They’re after the monsters.

Do you think their goal has switched to
attacking the monsters?

Hmm, I wonder... I mean, it’s a possibility,
sure, but...

No, I’m afraid we lack the data we need to
draw any conclusions now.

No point in considering things we don’t know
about. Let’s focus on search and rescue.
Right!
Rescue takes priority.

Um, Shuuji? I know you’re interested in the
enemy’s goal, but if we don’t hurry...

Oh, yes! You’re right! Sorry, lives are far
more important than this.
Let’s focus on the rescue effort now.

At any rate, the rescue effort takes top
priority. Let’s save whoever we can.
